text: (yakub nabi tama putun edalos denagen yusufvada, bunyaminvada adhika vasayen adaraya kirima gæna avadhanaya kala anit putun irsya kara) “api saktivantayin vasayen sitiyadi yusufda, ohuge sahodarayada apage piyata apata vada adhika vasayen kæmættata patra vuvan vasayen sitinnaha. (mehi) apage piya niyata vasayenma prakata væræddehi sitinneya”
